htmlProjects.title: Landing page "Ice cream"
htmlProjects.descTasks: My tasks: preparing base common styles, Header and Hero sections, modal windows, code review.
htmlProjects.descStack: I used HTML, SASS, Figma, Parcel.

jsProjects.title: "Movie libriary" team project
jsProjects.descTitle: Team development of movie library with ability to search a film,  watch a trailer, add and remove it from your own              library.
jsProjects.descTasks: My tasks: modal window with additional information about film, ability to watch the trailer, adding and removing a movie to/from personal library.
jsProjects.descStack: I used HTML, SASS, JS, templating (Handlebars), NPM( axios, basicLightbox, Notiflix).

jsProjects.title: Countdown and Stopwatch
jsProjects.descTitle: 2 apps: Countdown and Stopwatch based on Date Object.

reactProjects.title: "Wallet" app, fullstack team project
reactProjects.descTitle: App allows user to add transactions, get access to the current exchange rate and transactions statistic. Before user gets access to the app, it is nessesary to sign up
reactProjects.descTasks: My tasks: markup and functionality of Header, Nav, Add  transaction and Logout modals, Loader components, routing, localization and animation of the App,  writting README.
reactProjects.descStack: I used React JS, Redux, NPM (i18next, axios, formik, yup, react-toastify, react-transition-group, react-router v6).
